title: Spelunker Potion
summaries: The Spelunker Potion is a buff potion that grants the Spelunker buff when consumed, which illuminates valuable nearby objects. The highlight color varies between versions. This lasts for 5 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version] [img:Legacy tModLoader version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]).
It has a small chance to appear as a bonus drop from Slimes.
The Spelunker buff illuminates the following:
